cause.description:
So the 2007 Gucci Fall Line is out and the handbags are to die for...like totally! My cause is all about promoting style and italian designer handbags...for me ofcourse! So be a sport and lets see if my friends will help support this totally awesome cause so that I can strut my new double interlocking G all purpose Gucci bag at your next partaiii! Thanks Guys!
http://www.gucci.com/us/us-english/us/classics/handbags/#162886_ABJ1G_2061
1. GUCCI FOREVER
cause.name: Need a New Gucci Bag
